metadata.description: Prospectuses for French translations of "Universal history, from the earliest account of time to the present" and Edward Gibbon's "History of the decline and fall of the Roman Empire" and for Desessarts' "Dictionnaire universel de police", as well as listings of titles sold by Nicolas-Léger Moutard
metadata.notes: Damaged, torn, stained and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text. Irregular pagination. Title page and cover are combined.
